topic.title: 5222.9000 Department of the Navy non-construction contracts containing construction work.

body.p: The DON created the DON Non-Construction Contract with Construction Work Guide containing procedures that supplement existing policy for non-construction contracts (e.g. for supplies, services, research and development) that contain elements of construction valued in excess of the micro-purchase threshold. The procedures apply to all HCAs that award and administer contracts (including task and delivery orders) for assigned program requirements. The Guide is available at the ASN(RDA) website under Policy and Guidance.
